citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 16-
JUNE-22. Upon arrival, I spoke to the only facility representative present. She was leaving for a meeting and there was
no other representative who could accompany the inspection.
End Section
